column2: India bans more than 300 combination drugs sold illegally NEW DELHI India has banned the manufacture and sale of more than 300 combination medicines
column3: including two widely used cough syrups
column5: a senior health ministry official said on Saturday.

column2: Indonesia's Pertamina and Marubeni sign gas turbine deal with GE JAKARTA
column3: March 13 A consortium made up of Indonesia's state energy firm PT Pertamina and Japan's Marubeni Corp has signed a deal with General Electric for the U.S. firm to provide gas turbines for a $2 billion power plant in Java
